author: Sean O'Kane
title: Ford joins Tesla and GM in helping with ventilator and mask supply
description: Ford is working with GE and 3M to supply more vital equipment to the medical community as quickly as possible. It’s also looking into ways to use some of its idled manufacturing facilities to help produce things like masks or ventilators, and it’s helping GE …
content:
The carmaker is working with GE and 3M to supply more vital equipment to the medical community
Photo by Amelia Holowaty Krales / The Verge
Ford has announced its working with 3M and General Electric to make the kinds of ventilators and masks that are curren… [+3601 chars]
